name: Clin N
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:** Celiac and superior mesenteric nodes are classified as regional nodes for TNM staging and are coded in regional lymph nodes.

**Note 3:** Para-aortic and pericaval lymph nodes are classified as regional nodes for TNM 7 staging and are now coded in regional lymph nodes
rows: Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed

    Periduodenal

    Porta hepatis (portal)(periportal) (hilar) (in hilus of liver)
